data.text: @dhmontgomery Is the tested population more or less likely than the general population to be infected?  Or is the test data considered an accurate depiction of the overall population’s positivity rate?  Hope this wording makes sense…
@oregonminda @dhmontgomery Idk but I’ve seen it done more places by now
@dhmontgomery @svdbosse Why is this not being done everywhere? I remember even at the beginning of the pandemic it was discussed and tracked but yet not widely done. Do you by chance know why?
@ajbutler45 @dhmontgomery Unfortunately, that comes out of the other end...
